func:
import os
import sys
from subprocess import Popen

track1 = "/media/pi/MP3/GAME/EN/Main logo 1 1.mp3"
track2 = "/media/pi/MP3/GAME/FR/Main logo 1 1.mp3"
if msg['lang_code'] == 1:
    player1 = Popen(['omxplayer', track1])
if msg['lang_code'] == 2:
    player1 = Popen(['omxplayer', track2])
